response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and bring substantial value. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its worth to be $1,000,000 to us. However, I understand that your valuation might differ. Would you consider purchasing this product at a price of $950,000? This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and exceptional customer support to ensure your satisfaction. Let's work together to make this valuable asset part of your business.", "product_price": 950000}
